column1: 32 year old woman, on steroid treatment for autoimmune disease. Fever and non-productive cough. Leucocytosis. Hypoxemic and hypocapnic respiratory failure.
Not verifiable contact with subjects in the red zone (Patient 1 Cremona). NCOV positive buffer 19.

Figs. 1-3: parenchymal consolidations in both upper lobes. Both lower lobes are almost completely occupied by parenchymal consolidations with aerial bronchogram, partial savings of the relative apical segments are evident.
